name: Abyss (itch) (VincentHu0326)
description:
This game is made for the Two-Minute Horror Jam.

You play as a diver who gets trapped underwater, your remaining oxygen can only support you to live up to 2 minutes, while this area is haunted by something...

Unzip the file and click Abyss.exe to run the game.

There are two difficulty levels that can be selected in game.

This is my first released game on itch.io, and it's the second game I'm working with Unity. I will launch another game in the short term. If you like this game I might expand it and make it a complete horror surviving game.

Enjoy!
